Question.Subject: CHATROULETTEMAP.com webpage, will they get my picture and address instantly if i go into Chatroulette?
Question.Content:
CHATROULETTE MAP webpage, will they get my picture and address instantly if i go into Chatroulette?

Question.ChosenAnswer: I don't think so! I've been a bit on chatroulette and never had any problems! Anyways, i'm using Facebuzz.com now so even less chances of finding myself on chatroulettemap! You should try it too!

Answer.Content: ChatLack.com is like chatroulette but with photos instead of webcam.
I don't think so! I've been a bit on chatroulette and never had any problems! Anyways, i'm using Facebuzz.com now so even less chances of finding myself on chatroulettemap! You should try it too!
